channel.title: A few help questions :D
channel.description:
Ok here are my needs of help
List:
- All the water in the server seems to be laver how do i change this - how can i make energy 100% all the time infinity - ive lost the pking shop "Ala" when i first starting editing my serv she wasn't made i don't think. - how to change exp rates,
Thanks, thats it for now.

item.title: A few help questions :D
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

kk thanks i set it to 100 now its infinity

Read full topic

item.title: A few help questions :D
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Denoria, post:3, topic:272968”][quote author=silabgarza link=topic=360293.msg2745382#msg2745382 date=1239588071]

  1. thats client sided
  2. just make it not drain energy, or just put playerEnergy = 100; in process
  3. wat u need help with this?
  4. look at the bottem of attack() method and attacknpc() method for the exp rates
    [/quote]ffs can you explain more about the energy always 100%[/quote]

Look for the integer playerEnergy and change it from 0 to 100. Simple enough?

Read full topic
